entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 9. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
